participant_1.background:
I am homeschooling my child.
I like getting up bright and early.
I live in a very small town.
I am allergic to cats.
I like to make crafts.

participant_2.background:
I live under the sea.
I have a tail as a feet and long wavy hair.
I have dinner with my family and then go out play with friends.
I love exploring with my sea creatures are my friends.
I spend most of my day at school.

content.text: I'm so tired. I got up early this morning to homeschool my child.
I wish I could sleep in. I spend most of my day at school.
I don't like school. I would rather be at home making crafts.
I love making crafts! I used to make them with my friends all the time.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to live in the ocean.
It's great! I can swim and explore all day long.
I would love to explore the ocean. I've only been swimming in a pool before.
You should come visit me! I would love to show you around.
I would love that! I'll bring my child too.
They would love it! We have so many fun things to do here.
This is so great! I'm so excited to meet you and explore the ocean.
I'm excited to meet you too! I can't wait to show you around.
